name: Calculus I
description: Introductory course in calculus covering topics including limits, derivatives, and integrals.

name: Calculus II
description: Continuation of Calculus I covering topics including series, parametric equations and polar coordinates.

name: Linear Algebra
description: Introductory course in linear algebra covering topics including vector spaces, linear transformations, matrices, and linear systems.

name: Abstract Algebra I
description: Introductory course in abstract algebra covering topics including groups, rings and fields.

name: Real Analysis I
description: Introductory course in real analysis covering topics including topology of the real line, sequences and series, and continuous functions.

name: Number Theory
description: Introductory course in number theory covering topics including divisibility, congruences, and primitive roots and the arithmetic of polynomials.
